injuries.comment: The Bulls reported on Wednesday (Dec. 3) that Essengue will have shoulder surgery and miss the remainder of the season, per HC Billy Donovan.
The Bulls listed Simons as OUT for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against Charlotte.
The Bulls listed Smith as Questionable for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against Charlotte.
The Bulls said on Saturday (Feb. 21) that Collins will undergo surgery for a sprain right toe and will be sidelined for the rest of the 2025-26 season.
The Bulls said on Saturday (Feb. 21) that Ivey will miss at least 2 weeks.
The Hornets listed Kalkbrenner as Probable for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against the Bulls.
The Hornets listed White as Probable for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against the Bulls.
The Hornets listed McNeeley as OUT for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against the Bulls.
The Heat listed Mitchell as Questionable for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against the Bucks.
The Heat listed Jovic as Doubtful for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against the Bucks.

payload.name: Bucks
payload.owner: Wes Edens, Jimmy Haslam, Jamie Dinan, Mike Fascitelli

injuries.comment: The Bucks announced on Thursday (Jan. 1) that Prince applied for a Disabled Player Exception for Prince earlier this month, indicating that they anticipate that he's substantially more likely than not to be unable to play through June 15, per Eric Nehm of
The Bucks listed Antetokounmpo as OUT for Tuesday's (Feb. 24) game against Miami.
